title: Configuring the number of contextual snippets used during search results clustering
description: Currently, if carrot.produceSummary = true, always one snippet is generated. For more flexibility, the clustering component could use the hl.snippets parameter, overridden if needed by carrot.summarySnippets.

comments.author: Stanislaw Osinski
comments.content: In trunk and branch_3x, wiki page updated.
